thread.title: Abbey Clancy exposes nipples in risqué sheer dress at Britain's Next Top Model bash in London
thread.title_full: Abbey Clancy exposes nipples in risqué sheer dress at Britain's Next Top Model bash in London

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Abbey Clancy exposes nipples in risqué sheer dress at Britain's Next Top Model bash in London
text:
Abbey Clancy exposes nipples in risqué sheer dress at Britain's Next Top Model bash in London The WAG and BNTM runner-up was the centre of attention at Thursday's launch party Share Abbey Clancy is back as a BNTM judge (Photo: Splash News) Share Get   
The brazen nipple flash appears to be the latest fashion trend taking red carpets - and Kardashian social media feeds - by storm. 
On Thursday, it was Abbey Clancy's turn to expose her bare cleavage as she attented the Britain's Next Top Model launch in London. 
The 31-year-old stunned in a revealing black dress that featured a sheer skirt and sheer top that showcased a generous amount of chest. 
Abbey was a picture of perfection as she posed in the risqué design on the red carpet at the Village Underground. Abbey Clancy (Photo: Splash News) Abbey Clancy (Photo: Splash News) 
Season 11 of the show is back on Lifetime and the WAG will be taking up judging duties once again. 
She'll be joined by handsome male model Paul Sculfor, HIlary Alexander and Nicky Johnston. 
Other guests at Thursday's night's launch bash included Lydia Bright, Jess Wright, Olivia Buckland and Misse Beqiri. Abby Clancy (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Abbey Clancy (Photo: Rex Features) 
Meanwhile, Abbey recently opened up her two daughters Sophia, six, and 21-month-old Liberty and hubby Peter Crouch. 
The former Strictly Come Dancing star - who won the BBC ballroom competition in 2013 - said: "I think the baby is going to be a shot-putter. She's just a little monkey, Liberty. Abbey Clancy and Peter Crouch (Photo: Getty) 
"Sophia - Pete's keen to get her into sport, he's got two girls, we took her to a tennis lesson and she had a nervous breakdown because she had to wear a tracksuit and not a skirt. 
"I think Pete thought he could retire and watch her be a world-class tennis player, it's totally not happening. She does what all little girls do, singing, dancing, playing with dolls, listening to pop music." Video Loading Click
